data.name: Egression: An Escape Room Experience
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Egression, Inc., home of the world’s most deluxe escape room experiences. Grab your favorite VR headset, and get locked inside innovative spaces designed specifically for puzzlers like you. Explore your surroundings. Solve puzzles. Find the key to your escape.



Explore engaging environments: Walk freely through the escape room establishment, complete your escape artist training, and traverse through two unique escape rooms devised from the ground up just for you.



Inspect intriguing objects: Analyze everything around you. Leave no stone unturned. Piece together the clues until the path forward becomes clear.



Solve puzzles: Challenge your mind with realistic escape room style puzzles made for VR. Solve your way from one "Aha!" moment to the next.



Escape: Accomplish what you set out to do: escape rooms. Puzzle your way through the Game Room. And then, if you’re itching for more, challenge yourself to the Deep Sea Lab.



Break stuff: And of course, every VR gamer’s dream - throw things on the floor to see if they break. (Some do!)

Features

  • Explore immersive environments
  • Interact with all objects you can see
  • Solve unique handcrafted puzzles
  • Escape two rooms
  • Play through 2-4 hours of content (depending on the level of your puzzle-solving skills)

data.short_description: You’re here for puzzles, and that’s what you’ll get. Step into a deluxe virtual escape room establishment. Challenge your mind with handcrafted puzzles designed exclusively for VR. Explore immersive environments and piece together the clues to escape!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR Headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
